content.rendered: Dilip Sharma, Executive Vice President, ECIG and Roshan Samuel, Associate Vice President, Products & Solutions Division, visited the Danfoss Headquarters in Nordborg, Denmark recently. During the course of their visit, they interacted with Jesper Therbo, Global Head of HVAC/R, Peder S. Spek, Product Manager, HVAC/R Drives, Chintan Kharche, Head of Portfolio and Strategy, Compact & Dedicated Drives, Chrestine Marie Hermansen and Jai Masand, Sales Manager- MENA Danfoss Power Electronics & Drives.
